dialog_message_builtin_champion_mastery_: You have reached your next milestone of Champion Mastery. Level {{masteryLevel}} - {{masteryTitle}} with {{championName}}!

Continue to advance your {{championName}} skills.
Acquire a Mastery {{nextMasteryLevel}} token by ranking {{gradeRequired}} or higher with {{championName}}. Combine {{tokensRequired}} of them in the Hextech Crafter to unlock Mastery level {{nextMasteryLevel}} for this champion.
dialog_message_loot_grants_CHAMPION_TOKE:
You've been awarded a Mastery {{masteryLevel}} token for grading {{minimumTokenGrade}} or higher on {{championName}}.

Combine {{tokensRequired}} of them in the Hextech Crafter to unlock Mastery level {{masteryLevel}} for this champion.

You've been awarded a Mastery {{masteryLevel}} token for grading {{minimumTokenGrade}} or higher on {{championName}}.

Combine {{tokensRequired}} of them in the Hextech Crafter to unlock Mastery level {{masteryLevel}} for this champion.
dialog_message_loot_grants_CHEST_champio: S- or greater has been earned by you or a teammate. You have been granted a chest!
dialog_message_loot_grants_MATERIAL_key_: You have earned a key fragment. These are used to forge keys which open chests.
dialog_message_loot_grants_HEXTECH_CHEST:
You've been awarded a Mastery Chest for hitting Milestone I!
Keep advancing Milestones to level up Mastery and get more rewards.

You've been awarded a Mastery Chest for hitting Milestone III!
Keep advancing Milestones to level up Mastery and get more rewards.
dialog_message_loot_grants_MASTERWORK_CH:
You've been awarded a Mastery Masterwork Chest for completing 12 milestones in your set!
Keep advancing Milestones to get more rewards.
